name: file-content-extraction
label: File Content Extraction
description: Utility to Extract Text, Artifacts and Metadata from almost any file. Internet connectivity is required for the connector to download dependent packages

name: fortinet-fortideceptor
label: Fortinet FortiDeceptor
description: FortiDeceptor is a deception-based Breach Protection Deceive, Expose and Eliminate External and Internal Threats.

name: fortinet-fortiedr
label: Fortinet FortiEDR
description: FortiEDR protects endpoints pre and post infection, stopping data breaches in real-time and automatically orchestrating incident investigation and response. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to events, forensics and collectors.

name: nozomi-networks-central-management-console
label: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console
description: The Nozomi Networks Central Management Console (CMC) consolidates OT and IoT risk monitoring and visibility from Guardian physical or virtual appliances across all of your distributed sites. It integrates with your IT security infrastructure for streamlined workflows and faster response to threats and anomalies.

name: servicenow
label: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow connector provides functionality to create, read, update and delete records of Table and Catalog type
